doc:
Patrick Troughton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_Troughton 0 Patrick George Troughton (, 25 March 1920 – 28 March 1987) was an English actor. Classically trained, he played the second incarnation of the Doctor in the long-running British science-fiction television series Doctor Who, which he played from 1966 to 1969; he reprised the role in 1973, 1983 and 1985. He appeared in several fantasy, science fiction and horror films. Patrick_George_Troughton ( , 25_March_1920 – 28_March_1987 ) was an_English_actor . Classically trained , he played the_second_incarnation of the_Doctor in the_long-running_British_science-fiction_television_series_Doctor Who , which he played from 1966 to 1969 ; he reprised the_role in 1973_,_1983_and_1985 . He appeared in several_fantasy , science_fiction_and_horror_films .
